title.narrative: Facilitating A New National Urban Development Plan (Nudp) In Argentina

description.narrative: The objective of this project is to provide the necessary technical knowledge and tools, as well as concrete proposals and strategies that will enable the Government of Argentina towards the development of a new National Urban Development Plan and achieve sustainable urban development, facilitated through the implementation of methodologies and expertise developed by UN-Habitat, while also building the capacity of the Argentine government to achieve its planned goals and to address the main identified issues discussed in previous meetings but also those identified and listed in the previous point. National Urban Plans have been acknowledged as a tool for urban development and are part of the New Urban Agenda.

department.narrative: Regional Office for Latin America and Caribbean

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya
